segments.pli: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa āveṇikāni dukkhāni, yāni mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of suffering that particularly apply to females. They’re undergone by females and not by men.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo daharova samāno patikulaṃ gacchati, ñātakehi vinā hoti.
segments.en: Firstly, a female, while still young, goes to live with her husband’s family and is separated from her relatives.

segments.pli: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa paṭhamaṃ āveṇikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
segments.en: This is the first kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmo utunī hoti.
segments.en: Furthermore, a female undergoes the menstrual cycle.

segments.pli: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa dutiyaṃ āveṇikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
segments.en: This is the second kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmo gabbhinī hoti.
Idaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa tatiyaṃ āveṇikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
segments.en: This is the third kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.

segments.pli: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa catutthaṃ āveṇikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
segments.en: This is the fourth kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mātugāmo purisassa pāricariyaṃ upeti.
segments.en: Furthermore, a female provides services for a man.

segments.pli: Idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmassa pañcamaṃ āveṇikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehi.
segments.en: This is the fifth kind of suffering that particularly applies to females.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca mātugāmassa āveṇikāni dukkhāni, yāni mātugāmo paccanubhoti, aññatreva purisehī”ti.
segments.en: These are the five kinds of suffering that particularly apply to females. They’re undergone by females and not by men.”
